titleStmt.title: Englands memorial, or a thankful remembrance upon the present never to be forgotten deliverance of both King and nation from the bloody Popish Plot. Shewing, that the Papists by their principles are real enemies to out King and countrey. / By a well-wisher to the Protestant religion.
titleStmt.author: Well-wisher to the Protestant religion.

titleStmt.title: Englands memorial, or a thankful remembrance upon the present never to be forgotten deliverance of both King and nation from the bloody Popish Plot. Shewing, that the Papists by their principles are real enemies to out King and countrey. / By a well-wisher to the Protestant religion.
titleStmt.author: Well-wisher to the Protestant religion.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Blest be our God, that gloriously did save".
Imperfect: cropped and torn, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
